sentences.en: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.cn: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.en: Egypt wants to solve the problem in an atmosphere of cordiality.
sentences.cn: 埃及想要友好地解决该问题。

sentences.en: He assured us of his ability to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 他向我们保证他有能力解决这个问题.

sentences.en: He has been trying to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 他一直在设法解决这一问题.

sentences.en: In this way, he was able to solve the mystery.
sentences.cn: 就这样, 他终于解开了这个秘密.

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to expect them to be able to solve the problem immediately.
sentences.cn: 指望他们能够立即解决问题是不现实的。

sentences.en: It isn't going to solve a single thing.
sentences.cn: 这什么问题也解决不了。

sentences.en: Let's think this out together — there must be a way to solve this.
sentences.cn: 让我们一起好好考虑一下吧,一定有办法能解决这件事情的.

sentences.en: More than 70% of murder cases were solved last year.
sentences.cn: 去年有 70% 以上的谋杀案被侦破

sentences.en: Once this difficulty is overcome, other problems will be easy to solve.
sentences.cn: 攻下这一关, 其他问题就好办了.

sentences.en: She leaned on him to help her to solve her problems.
sentences.cn: 她靠他帮忙解决自身问题。

sentences.en: Such comments are inane because they don't help us solve our problem.
sentences.cn: 这种评论纯属空洞之词,不能帮助我们解决问题.

sentences.en: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.cn: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.en: This problem is too hard for me to solve.
sentences.cn: 这个问题太难,我解决不了.

sentences.en: We can solve the problem no matter how complicated it is.
sentences.cn: 任凭问题多复杂,我们也能弄清楚.

sentences.en: We should develop the students'ability to analyse and solve problems.
sentences.cn: 我们应该培养学生分析问题和解决问题的能力.

sentences.en: We'll have to think of a way to solve the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们得想个法子解决这个问题.

sentences.en: You know, it occurs to me you could solve all your problems by obtaining more money.
sentences.cn: 依我看，你的所有问题都可以通过多挣点钱来解决。

words.tran_cn: 可以解决的；可以解的；可溶的
有偿付能力的；有溶解力的
解决方案；溶液；溶解；解答
[数] 可解性；解决之可能性；溶解度
[化学] 溶解；[化学] 溶剂化作用；溶化
解决者；[计] 解算机；[数] 求解程序

trans.tran_en: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem
to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem
